name: consume your adoration nineteen
description:
The city gnawed at the bones of its residents
Using their skin and flesh
As brick and mortar 
For payday loan stores
Strip malls
Dirty snow mounds
Polluted rivers
Chain restaurants 
Characterless apartment complexes
The street lights
Warmed the spoons
That heated the needles
That plunged into eager forearms
In dimly lit family rooms
As daytime television was watched
As people considered a structured settlement
And thought of ways to leverage class action lawsuits
Fingers were lost with fireworks
And debt collectors feasted on bloated corpses
Lying by the river
The three favorite pastimes were 
Drinking
Prescription medication
And giving up
Each one celebrated more than the last
Families prided themselves on never leaving
It wasn’t their decision 
But it was a source of pride
The city decided who stayed and who left
In some sadistic lottery
Those that left were spared 
With only a failing liver
And a deteriorating mind
Those that stayed
Were shoveled into the furnace
Creating enough steam 
For the factories to run
Enough ash to pave another parking lot
And enough directionless heat
to birth the next generation of carrion 
forced to stay
